Package com.hexaforce.warzone.services

Class DominationMapFileReader

java.lang.Object
com.hexaforce.warzone.services.DominationMapFileReader
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
Direct Known Subclasses:
MapReaderAdapter
public class DominationMapFileReader extends Object implements Serializable
The MapFileReader class handles the parsing of map files.

  • Method Details

    • parseDominationMapFile

      public void parseDominationMapFile(GameContext p_gameContext, Map p_map, List<String> p_linesOfFile)
      Parses a map file and updates the game state and map objects accordingly.
      Parameters:
      p_gameContext - The current GameContext instance.
      p_map - The current Map instance.
      p_linesOfFile - All lines in the map document.

    • getMetaData

      public List<String> getMetaData(List<String> p_fileLines, String p_switchParameter)
      Retrieves the corresponding lines from the map file.
      Parameters:
      p_fileLines - All lines in the map document.
      p_switchParameter - Type of lines needed: country, continent, borders.
      Returns:
      The list of required lines.

    • parseContinentsMetaData

      public List<Continent> parseContinentsMetaData(List<String> p_continentList)
      Parses the extracted continent data from the map file.
      Parameters:
      p_continentList - Includes continent data in a list from the map file.
      Returns:
      List of processed continent metadata.

    • parseCountriesMetaData

      public List<Country> parseCountriesMetaData(List<String> p_countriesList)
      Parses the extracted country and border data from the map file.
      Parameters:
      p_countriesList - Includes country data in a list from the map file.
      Returns:
      List of processed country metadata.

    • parseBorderMetaData

      public List<Country> parseBorderMetaData(List<Country> p_countriesList, List<String> p_bordersList)
      Links the country objects to their respective neighbors.
      Parameters:
      p_countriesList - Total country objects initialized.
      p_bordersList - Border data lines.
      Returns:
      List of updated country objects.

    • linkCountryContinents

      public List<Continent> linkCountryContinents(List<Country> p_countries, List<Continent> p_continents)
      Links countries to corresponding continents and sets them in the object of continent.
      Parameters:
      p_countries - Total country objects.
      p_continents - Total continent objects.
      Returns:
      List of updated continents.
